languages.text: {n}Дерзкий паренек только упрямо вскидывает голову и поджимает губы. Прочие испуганно притихают.{/n}
{n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дерзкий паренек только упрямо вскидывает голову и поджимает губы. Прочие испуганно притихают.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The boy just raises his head stubbornly and purses his lips. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}
{n}The boy just raises his head stubbornly and purses his lips. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}
{n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

{n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个男孩倔强地扬起下巴，紧紧地抿着嘴。剩下的孩子在恐惧中安静了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个男孩倔强地扬起下巴，紧紧地抿着嘴。剩下的孩子在恐惧中安静了下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El niño levanta el mentón con obstinación y aprieta los labios. Los demás, asustados, se callan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El niño levanta el mentón con obstinación y aprieta los labios. Los demás, asustados, se callan.{/n}

languages.text: {n}少年はただ頑なに顎を上げ、口を固く結んでいる。他の者たちは恐怖で静まり返る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}少年はただ頑なに顎を上げ、口を固く結んでいる。他の者たちは恐怖で静まり返る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Junge hebt lediglich störrisch sein Kinn und presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strick zusammen. Die anderen verstummen vor Angst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Junge hebt lediglich störrisch sein Kinn und presst die Lippen zu einem dünnen Strick zusammen. Die anderen verstummen vor Angst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le garçon se contente de lever le menton d'un air obstiné, les lèvres fermement serrées. En revanche, la peur fait taire les autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dudaklarını birbirine bastıran oğlan, dikbaşlılığını kanıtlamak istercesine çenesini kaldırıyor. Diğerleri ise korkudan çıt çıkarmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The boy just raises his chin stubbornly, his mouth pressed into a hard line. The others quiet down in fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Oğlan, dikbaşlılığını kanıtlamak istercesine çenesini kaldırıyor. Dudaklarını birbirine bastırdığı için ince bir çizgi gibi görünüyor. Diğerleri ise korkudan çıt çıkarmıyor.{/n}
